message.content: {"given_definition_quality":70,"better_definition":"an old person, especially a man or woman","sentence":"老人笑。","image_prompt":"In a soft apocalypse animation style, show an elderly person with gray hair and gentle wrinkles, smiling warmly. The background is faded and dreamy, with elements suggesting the end of an era but retaining softness and hope. The person's wise, friendly expression is the focus. Soft, pastel tones with a touch of melancholy yet warmth.","sentence_translation":"The old person smiles."}
